EmailTemplate.description: Sent to SF members for testimonials
EmailTemplate.name: SF Testimonials
EmailTemplate.subject: Time sensitive, IAVA needs your help
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It has been a while since IAVA was last in the San Francisco area and I wanted to hear from you. Recently you participated in an event with IAVA and we are looking to hear how that has impacted you - or how it has generally impacted you over the years. Whether it was running in the Pat's Run shadow run in the Presido, being a part of our focus group with IDEO, or sharing your thoughts of IAVA with us at breakfast. I would appreciate it if you could respond to me quickly.
Sincerely,
Jason -- Jason Hansman Membership Director Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America
